content:
The lang team is holding the next planning meeting on July 7th (next week), and is looking for updates from the active projects -- this topic is for the macro metavariable work, tracked in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83527

Good questions to consider:

  • What are recent topics of discussion?
  • Any exciting developments since the last check-in?
  • Any points where the group is stuck and the lang-team could weigh in?
  • Any potential design meeting topics?
  • Any other concerns?

@Mark Juggurnauth-Thomas (if you're markbt on github) -- have you had a chance to find some time to work on this? No worries if there's not been any significant progress since the last update. If you could leave a status update on the tracking issue that'd be great!
I'm afraid there's been no progress, as I simply haven't found any spare time to work on it. I'll post an update on the tracking issue.
